'''Amir Moulavi''' is the former ''[[Minecraft Realms]]'' lead developer<ref>{{tweet|mamirm|311899364987637760|@Chilangosta89 Hey, I'm responsible for Minecraft Realms development. Read more here: https://www.gamesindustry.biz/articles/2013-03-13-mojang-targets-families-with-minecraft-realms-subs-service|Mar 13, 2013}}</ref> at [[Mojang Studios]]. Originally a contractor with the company from September 2012,<ref>{{tweet|mamirm|344397556433960960|@DarthBotto You can at least correct this: I've been a consultant at Mojang from Sep 2012|Jun 11, 2013}}</ref> he was officially inducted into the company in June 2013.<ref name="fb">https://www.facebook.com/amir.moulavi/about?ref=br_tf</ref>{{better source needed}} He moderated the Persian section of the official Minecraft translating in Crowdin.<ref>https://crowdin.net/project/minecraft/fa</ref>
He went to "{{w|Nasr High School of Mashhad}}" and after that to "{{w|Islamic Azad University}}" to learn Computer Engineering.<ref name="fb"/>{{better source needed}}
He worked in Squace AB from 2009 to 2010 and Jayway AB from 2010 to 2013.<ref name="fb"/>{{better source needed}}

He publicly announced his departure from Mojang in February, 2016.<ref>{{tweet|mamirm|701658392092348416|It's been incredible to work on @Minecraft but it's time for new challenges, good bye @Mojang, hello @Klarna :)|Feb 21, 2016}}</ref>
